entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 5. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy late in the morning then periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 late in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 8 April 2023
